Spark UDF vs sql expressions

27 March 2020

Introduction to spark udf and expressions spark internal storage format ints, utf8, unsafe Generated code analysis of udf vs expressions on int + 1 Generated code analysis of udf vs expressions on string + lit(“ hi”) UDf vs expressions conclusion? Udf nullability and predicate pushdown. Udf null input protection Possible improvements -> Specialization implemented for codegen. Check also the input types, not just the udf function inputs Conclusion and recommendations for spark udf and expressions. Don’t use it unless you want to convert from internal row straight to something
